alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 10:10PM CDT until May 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River AT Alvarado. * WHEN...From late Monday night to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 108.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. Overland flooding of local agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 103.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 107.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 106.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
